FieldType.Name: DESTINATION_ENCODING
FieldType.OneLineDescription: how the HW encode each destination type

EnumVal.Name: PORT_ID
EnumVal.Description: encoding value for POrt ID in destination

EnumVal.Name: MC_ID
EnumVal.Description: encoding value for MC_ID in destination

EnumVal.Name: FLOW_ID
EnumVal.Description: encoding value for FLOW_ID in destination

EnumVal.Name: LAG_ID
EnumVal.Description: encoding value for LAG_ID in destination

EnumVal.Name: INGRESS_TRAP_DEST
EnumVal.Description: encoding value for INGRESS_TRAP_DEST in destination

EnumVal.Name: FEC
EnumVal.Description: encoding value for FEC in destination

FieldType.Name: DESTINATION_JR1_ENCODING
FieldType.OneLineDescription: how the HW encode each destination type for Jericho 1 format

EnumVal.Name: PORT_ID
EnumVal.Description: encoding value for POrt ID in destination

EnumVal.Name: MC_ID_JR1
EnumVal.Description: encoding value for MC_ID in destination

EnumVal.Name: FLOW_ID_JR1
EnumVal.Description: encoding value for FLOW_ID in destination

EnumVal.Name: LAG_ID
EnumVal.Description: encoding value for LAG_ID in destination

EnumVal.Name: FEC_JR1
EnumVal.Description: encoding value for FEC in destination

EnumVal.Name: INGRESS_TRAP_DEST_JR1
EnumVal.Description: encoding value for INGRESS_TRAP_DEST in destination

FieldType.Name: INLIF_ENCODING
FieldType.OneLineDescription: how the HW encode each LIF type

EnumVal.Name: AC_P2P
EnumVal.Description: encoding for LIF with type AC P2P

EnumVal.Name: AC_MP
EnumVal.Description: encoding for LIF with type AC MP

EnumVal.Name: AC_P2P_LARGE
EnumVal.Description: encoding for LIF with type AC P2P_LARGE

EnumVal.Name: AC_MP_LARGE
EnumVal.Description: encoding for LIF with type AC MP_LARGE

FieldType.Name: FWD_DEST_ENCODING
FieldType.OneLineDescription: how the HW encode each destination type

EnumVal.Name: INVALID
EnumVal.Description: Invalid encoding value

EnumVal.Name: OUTLIF
EnumVal.Description: encoding for dest + outlif

EnumVal.Name: EEI
EnumVal.Description: encoding for dest

EnumVal.Name: OUTLIF_STAT
EnumVal.Description: encoding for dest

EnumVal.Name: EEI_STAT
EnumVal.Description: encoding for dest

EnumVal.Name: DESTINATION
EnumVal.Description: encoding for dest

EnumVal.Name: DESTINATION_STAT
EnumVal.Description: encoding for dest

EnumVal.Name: DOUBLE_OUTLIF
EnumVal.Description: encoding for dest

FieldType.Name: SUPER_FEC_ENCODING
FieldType.OneLineDescription: how the HW encode super FEC types

EnumVal.Name: NO_PROTECTION
EnumVal.Description: Invalid encoding value

EnumVal.Name: NO_PROTECTION_W_STAT
EnumVal.Description: encoding for dest + outlif

EnumVal.Name: W_PROTECTION
EnumVal.Description: encoding for dest

EnumVal.Name: W_PROTECTION_W_STAT
EnumVal.Description: encoding for dest

FieldType.Name: FODO_ENCODING
FieldType.OneLineDescription: how the HW encode FODO types
